verses.verse: Oh sing<WH7891> unto Jehovah<WH3068> a new<WH2319> song<WH7892>: Sing<WH7891> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, all the earth<WH776>.
Sing <WH7891> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, bless<WH1288> his name<WH8034>; Show forth<WH1319> his salvation<WH3444> from day<WH3117> to day<WH3117>.
Declare <WH5608> his glory<WH3519> among the nations<WH1471>, His marvellous<WH6381> works among all the peoples<WH5971>.
For great<WH1419> is Jehovah<WH3068>, and greatly<WH3966> to be praised<WH1984>: He is to be feared<WH3372> above all gods<WH430>.
For all the gods<WH430> of the peoples<WH5971> are idols<WH457>; But Jehovah<WH3068> made<WH6213> the heavens<WH8064>.
Honor <WH1935> and majesty<WH1926> are before<WH6440> him<WH5797>: Strength and beauty<WH8597> are in his sanctuary<WH4720>.
Ascribe <WH3051> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, ye kindreds<WH4940> of the peoples<WH5971>, Ascribe<WH3051> unto Jehovah<WH3068> glory<WH3519> and strength<WH5797>.
Ascribe <WH3051> unto Jehovah<WH3068> the glory<WH3519> due unto his name<WH8034>: Bring<WH5375> an offering<WH4503>, and come<WH935> into his courts<WH2691>.
Oh worship<WH7812> Jehovah<WH3068> in holy<WH6944> array<WH1927>: Tremble<WH2342> before<WH6440> him<WH776>, all the earth.

Say <WH559> among the nations<WH1471>, Jehovah<WH3068> reigneth<WH4427>: The world<WH8398> also is established<WH3559> that it cannot be moved<WH4131>: He will judge<WH1777> the peoples<WH5971> with equity<WH4339>.
Let the heavens<WH8064> be glad<WH1523>, and let the earth<WH776> rejoice<WH8055>; Let the sea<WH3220> roar<WH7481>, and the fulness thereof<WH4393>;
Let the field<WH7704> exult<WH5937>, and all that is therein<WH6086>; Then shall all the trees of the wood<WH3293> sing for joy<WH7442>

Before <WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; For he cometh<WH935>, For he cometh<WH935> to judge<WH8199> the earth<WH776>: He will judge<WH8199> the world<WH8398> with righteousness<WH6664>, And the peoples<WH5971> with his truth<WH530>.
